Breadth-First.Explanation: Broadly collects general seaside clues and overall Mediterranean vibes without a specific hypothesis
Divergent generation of multiple location hypotheses (Nice, Alicante, Cannes) based on surface features
Reintroduces Nice as a possible location, returning to broad hypothesis exploration

Depth-First.Explanation: Shifts to verifying Italian road markings and zebra crossings to test the Italy hypothesis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Italian road markings (yellow stripes, zebra crossings)

Depth-First.Explanation: Examines bus stop marking, bin, railing and furniture to confirm Italian town characteristics
Depth-First.KeyElement: Bus stop marking and street furniture

Depth-First.Explanation: Resolves contradictory French vs. Italian parking features and narrows to the Italian Riviera
Depth-First.KeyElement: Blue zone vs. yellow curb road markings

Depth-First.Explanation: Visualizes Sanremo’s layout from memory to match image details
Depth-First.KeyElement: Mental map of bike lanes and pedestrian paths in Sanremo

Depth-First.Explanation: Compares Nice’s dual-road layout to Sanremo’s single-road arrangement for verification
Depth-First.KeyElement: Layout differences of roads and walkways

Depth-First.Explanation: Clarifies that only one two-lane road exists and highlights the red spherical trash can as a local clue
Depth-First.KeyElement: Single two-lane road and red spherical trash can

Depth-First.Explanation: Focuses on Lungomare Imperatrice in Sanremo to refine the hypothesis to a specific neighborhood
Verifies the exact seafront road name in Sanremo (Corso Imperatrice vs. Corso Nazario Sauro)
Confirms final location as Passeggiata Imperatrice with supporting citations
Depth-First.KeyElement: Combined bus markings, palm-lined walkway history

Depth-First.Explanation: Synthesizes all clues (bus marking, palm terraces, road scale) to conclusively identify Sanremo

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moves from broad hypothesis listing to focused verification of the Italy hypothesis
Depth analysis on Italy yields reconsideration of Nice, reverting to divergent exploration
After broad re-exploration, attention narrows again to a specific Sanremo neighborhood
